biotools.summary:
Standalone application for Gene Ontology and Human Phenotype Ontology term enrichment analysis.
DiNGO is a standalone application based on open source code from BiNGO a Java based tool aimed to determine which Gene Ontology (GO) categories are overrepresented in a set of genes. DiNGO is a command line application which is able to do GO and HPO term enrichment on a set of genes or proteins. DiNGO is multithreaded application which offers fast processing of large datasets. In addition, the application offers gene/protein identifiers conversion tool as well as automatic download of HPO and GO annotation resources.
